title: Test boundary condition at exact cutoff time
description:
Rating 8/10: The boundary uses `>=` but this is not explicitly tested. If someone changes to `>`, issues at exact cutoff would be excluded.

Test should: Set small window (e.g., 0.1 hours), close issue, verify it appears at boundary.

title: Test closed issue without closed_at timestamp
description:
Rating 8/10: The filter logic handles closed issues without closed_at by returning false, but this path is untested.

Test should: Create an issue, manipulate database to have status='closed' but closed_at=null, verify Recent filter excludes it.

title: Test all filter modes
description: Verify all, open, and ready filters work correctly in the extension.

title: Test extension shows real beads issues
description: Launch extension and verify the panel displays the actual open beads issues from the project.

title: Test extension scaffolding in VSCode
description: Launch extension in development host and verify the Beads panel appears in the activity bar.

title: Test non-default recentWindowHours config
description:
Rating 7/10: Current test uses default 1-hour window. Does not verify configuration actually affects behavior.

Test should: Set recentWindowHours to small value, close issue, verify config is respected.

title: Capture test issue IDs at creation
Test and verify isolation works
description: Run tests multiple times to verify consistent results with isolated database

title: Test release process
description: Create test release to verify workflow works end-to-end

title: Test Epic: Sample Project Structure
description: Demo epic with nested tasks to test beadsx extension
